document_data.title: Death on the Wall
document_data.design: [[Greg Marks]]{{Cite adventurers league/Death on the Wall|1}}
document_data.story arc:
''[[Adventurers League/Rage of Demons|Rage of Demons]]''
''Six Knives for Torin Nomerthal''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Death on the Wall''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Rage of Demons|Rage of Demons]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Hillsfar]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters. Part Two of ''Six Knives for Torin Nomerthal''.

{{Quote|''First [[Torin Nomerthal|Lord Torin Nomerthal]] and several of his advisors will be leaving Hillsfar to inspect the Wall with only a small contingent of Red Plumes. The chance to strike is now!''|}}
